Entries.Introduction: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!
Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}'s clinic.#$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} says {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} likes having me around in case {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Wed8: I work at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}'s clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}'s nice, but not really my type...
Entries.Event_Hospital_1: Of course {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}'ll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s
Entries.Event_Hospital_3: You're right. I should just tell {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} the truth.%fork$u
Entries.Sat: Do you know my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}'s a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} out in the laboratory.
Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} would flip.
Entries.event_robot3: Heh...$8#$b#Yeah I guess {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} did kinda say that, didn't {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}?$l#$b#...Um...$l
Entries.summer_Tue: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}} is my half-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Brother:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}} hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Brother:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} doesn't act like one.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I wonder how {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} is doing? Maybe I'll give her a call later today.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}'s been tracking the weather patterns for the last twenty years.#$e#It's a little too early to tell, but the results have revealed some abnormal trends.
Entries.funReturn_Maru: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Parents:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.spring_22: If my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Brother:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} wasn't such a hermit I'd invite {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Brother:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} will ever have the courage to ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} out?
Entries.winter_5: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}'s doing okay... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} can get depressed in winter, when there's less opportunity for field research.

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} decides to get married some day.

BeforeMovie.Text: Hey, @! I'm looking forward to this one... I hope we learn a lot!$h

DuringMovie.Text: Ah, I see... that's very interesting!

AfterMovie.Text: That was really interesting! I had no idea that so much life could be found in the big city.
